verses.verse: Now <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> with <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> <S%H2796>masons,<s%> <S%H7023><s%> and <S%H2796>carpenters,<s%> <S%H6086><s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for him.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3045>realized<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H3559>established<s%> him as <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> [and] that his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> was <S%H4605>highly<s%> <S%H5375>exalted,<s%> for the <S%H5668>sake<s%> of His <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H3205>children<s%> <S%H3205>born<s%> [to him] in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> <S%H8051>Shammua,<s%> <S%H7727>Shobab,<s%> <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%>

When the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> had been <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up in <S%H1245>search<s%> of <S%H1732>David;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of it and <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H6440>against<s%> them.
Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H6584>made<s%> a <S%H6584>raid<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Shall I <S%H5927>go<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>? And wilt Thou <S%H5414>give<s%> them into my <S%H3027>hand<s%>?" Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H5927>"Go<s%> up, for I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

So they <S%H5927>came<s%> up to Baal-perazim, and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>defeated<s%> them <S%H8033>there;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> has <S%H6555>broken<s%> <S%H6555>through<s%> my <S%H340>enemies<s%> by my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> like the <S%H6556>breakthrough<s%> of <S%H4325>waters.<s%>" <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> that <S%H4725>place<s%> Baal-perazim.
And they <S%H5800>abandoned<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> so <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>gave<s%> the <S%H559>order<s%> and they were <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "You shall not <S%H5927>go<s%> up <S%H310>after<s%> them; <S%H5437>circle<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> <S%H4480>behind<s%> <S%H5921><s%> them, and <S%H935>come<s%> at them in <S%H4136>front<s%> of the <S%H1057>balsam<s%> <S%H1057>trees.<s%>

"And it shall be when you <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H6807>marching<s%> in the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H1057>balsam<s%> <S%H1057>trees,<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> you shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> will have <S%H3318>gone<s%> out <S%H6440>before<s%> you to <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>"

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him, and they <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> from <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> even as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H1507>Gezer.<s%>

Then the <S%H8034>fame<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out into <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>lands;<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>brought<s%> the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of him on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
